service

类 TextService

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.TextService

  • public class TextService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the analyzer of the server system

    When any of its method is waken up by the server controller it will separate the parameters from the command and pass them to the TextDao. After get the response form the TextDao it will package it into Response case in util package and pass it to client.

    另请参阅:
    TextDao, Response

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) TextDao dao 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TextService(TextDao dao)
      This constructor will build a TextService object with a TexDao (a method for connecting to database) attaching to it.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String calculateMD5(byte[] bytes)
      This method will calculate the md5 code form the bytes of context to help the upload method to check if the md5 code matches the context.
      void handleCompare(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      This method will awake the Compare method in TextDao with two md5 code attaching to it as parameters.
      void handleDelete(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      This method will awake the Delete method in TextDao with the md5 code of the particular file attaching to it as parameters.
      void handleDownload(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      This method will awake the Download method in TextDao with a md5 code and a output path String in header "path" attaching to it as parameters.
      void handleExists(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      This method will awake the Exist method in TextDao with a md5 code string of the file being checked attaching to it as a parameter.
      void handleList(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      This method will awake the list method in TextDao with no parameter attach to it.
      void handleUpload(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      This method will awake the Insert method in TextDao with a md5 code String and a context String attaching to it as parameter The method will check if the md5 code matches the file context, and send a Hash not match case back to server when the conflict appears.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • dao

        TextDao dao

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TextService

        public TextService(TextDao dao)
        This constructor will build a TextService object with a TexDao (a method for connecting to database) attaching to it.
        参数:
        dao - The database connector

    • 方法详细资料

      • calculateMD5

        public java.lang.String calculateMD5(byte[] bytes)
        This method will calculate the md5 code form the bytes of context to help the upload method to check if the md5 code matches the context.
        参数:
        bytes - The byte array of the context string
        返回:
        The md5 code of context

      • handleCompare

        public void handleCompare(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
        This method will awake the Compare method in TextDao with two md5 code attaching to it as parameters.

        The method in TextDao will return two string of these corresponding context. If there is no such file in the database, it will return the FailureResponse of "File no found".If the exam is passed, then it will compare the context sent by the TextDao.Compare, and sent the results of the calculate methods back to client.

        参数:
        ctx - The request message from client.
        另请参阅:
        TextDao.Compare(String, String)

      • handleDelete

        public void handleDelete(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
        This method will awake the Delete method in TextDao with the md5 code of the particular file attaching to it as parameters.

        The method in TextDao will send back the boolean value about whether the delete action is successfully executed in the database.If it returns the true, it will send back the message of "Success", otherwise it may return the FailureResponse of "File not founded".

        参数:
        ctx - The request message from client.
        另请参阅:
        TextDao.Delete(String)

      • handleDownload

        public void handleDownload(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
        This method will awake the Download method in TextDao with a md5 code and a output path String in header "path" attaching to it as parameters.

        The method in TextDao will try to download the file to the output path . If there is no such file in the database, it will return the FailureResponse of "File no found".

        参数:
        ctx - The request message from client.
        另请参阅:
        TextDao.Download(String, String)

      • handleExists

        public void handleExists(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
        This method will awake the Exist method in TextDao with a md5 code string of the file being checked attaching to it as a parameter.

        The method in TextDao will return a boolean to tell whether the file exist in the database.It will than be packaged into Response.

        参数:
        ctx - The request message from client.
        另请参阅:
        TextDao.Exists(String)

      • handleList

        public void handleList(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
        This method will awake the list method in TextDao with no parameter attach to it.

        The method in TextDao will return a list containing the DocumentAbstract , once this method receive the list, it will package it into a ObjectMapper and send it back to server.

        参数:
        ctx - The request message from client.
        另请参阅:
        TextDao.List()

      • handleUpload

        public void handleUpload(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
        This method will awake the Insert method in TextDao with a md5 code String and a context String attaching to it as parameter

        The method will check if the md5 code matches the file context, and send a Hash not match case back to server when the conflict appears. If they pass the exam, but this file has been found in the database it may receive a false from the TextDao.Insert, the FailureResponse of "File already Exist" will be sent to client.Or it will send back a successful response.

        参数:
        ctx - The request message from client.
        另请参阅:
        TextDao.Insert(String, String), calculateMD5(byte[])
